articles.description: Max Verstappen says that "frustration" led to his collision with George Russell during the Spanish Grand Prix and that the move "was not right and shouldn't have happened".
articles.title: Max Verstappen-George Russell collision: F1 world champion admits move 'was not right'

articles.description: Get your questions into our reporters as the transfer window opens, and get the latest on the biggest deals.
articles.title: Transfers Q&A: Send your questions to our reporters as the transfer window opens

articles.description: Watch live and follow updates as England manager Sarina Wiegman and defender Lucy Bronze speak to the media before Tuesday's Nations League game against Spain.
articles.title: England news conference: Wiegman & Bronze speak before Spain Nations League tie

articles.description: Joe Root is now England's leading run-scorer in one-day internationals - what are the numbers behind his brilliance?
articles.title: Joe Root 'getting better with age', says England captain Harry Brook

articles.description: Barcelona sporting director Deco says they are now a well-run club who do not need to sell players this summer.
articles.title: Deco on Barcelona's financial future, challenging Real Madrid and Lamine Yamal

articles.description: Sweden's Maja Stark wins her first major title with a two-shot victory in the US Women's Open in Wisconsin.
articles.title: US Women's Open: Maja Stark wins maiden major title with Nelly Korda joint second

articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler emulates Tiger Woods by winning the Memorial for a second consecutive year.
articles.title: Memorial Tournament: Scottie Scheffler cruises to four-shot victory

articles.description: Jack Draper's rise up the rankings has been "insane", says Alexander Bublik - who wonders how he can beat him in the French Open fourth round.
articles.title: French Open 2025: Jack Draper's rise 'insane' says next opponent Alexander Bublik

articles.description: Brentford agree a deal with Liverpool for goalkeeper Caoimhin Kelleher, with Bees number one Mark Flekken set for a move to Bayer Leverkusen.
articles.title: Caoimhin Kelleher: Liverpool keeper set for Brentford move

articles.description: Australia all-rounder Glenn Maxwell retires from one-day internationals to focus on next year's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: Australia: Glenn Maxwell retires from ODIs to focus on 2026 T20 World Cup
